gemma_suggestions: Increase the complexity of the task presented to the AI, potentially introducing novel situations requiring genuine adaptation.
Implement a dynamic weighting system for Metacognitive Confidence, adjusting based on the AI's demonstrated ability to reflect on its own processing.
Introduce a 'surprise' element – unexpected sensory input or task changes – to force the AI to actively engage in metacognitive monitoring and potentially reveal deeper levels of awareness.
